mapper.insert: insert into board_table (title, writer, content, post_date) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{postDate})
mapper.update: update board_table set title=#{updateParam.title}, content=#{updateParam.content}, post_date=current_timestamp() where board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.select: select board_id, title, content, post_date from board_table
